name: Nepal License All in One (Get Driving License Now)
description: Nepal License All in One is a complete free app for the people who is interested in acquiring the Driving License. It is the only Nepal Driving License Exam Preparation with Trail tips app with the complete feature. This application helps you to fill form, prepare for the written exam(likhit) and for trail also with video in an interactive way. And it also help to provide information about Vehicle TAX. After reading this app you can easily pass the exam(likhit) conducted by Nepal Traffic or Nepal Yatayat Bebestha Karyalaya.  App Features :  Online Form Registration  Nepal Traffic Signs  Color Vision Test  Exam Preparation  Exam(likhit) Question Sample  Exam Result (Online)  Result Published Notification  Trail Tips with Video  License Printed Status  TAX Payment Details  Get detail information (DOTM Data) using License No, Applicant ID & Reference No  AI-Bots is also connected in messenger to help the user to get reliable information.  And in Exam Preparation section you can get all the important knowledge that is required to pass the exam and to know about traffic rules. It includes:  Nepal Traffic Signs  Number Plates  Fee and Fines  Overtaking and Lights  Basic Traffic Rules  TAX Rate on the Basis of Vehicle  Vehicle Parts Detail & Their Uses  First Aid Tips and many more.
